BR_text.BRsummary: Incorrect install from source instructions on gluonnlp website
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-link:https://gluon-nlp.mxnet.io/master/install/install-more.html>https://gluon-nlp.mxnet.io/master/install/install-more.html</denchmark-link>
 
 <denchmark-code>pip install --pre --upgrade mxnet
 git clone https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp
 cd gluon-nlp && python setup.py install --user
 </denchmark-code>
 
 This does not clone the master branch of gluonnlp. The MXNet version is also not up-to-date
